meanings.definition: Amusing or entertaining in a way that provokes laughter.
meanings.sent1: The clown's performance was the funniest thing I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: She told the funniest joke at the party.
meanings.sent3: The funniest movie made everyone in the theater laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: His exaggerated facial expressions were the funniest sight.
meanings.sent5: The funniest memory from the trip was when we got lost in the maze.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of 'funny', meaning causing amusement or laughter.
meanings.sent1: Watching comedians always brings out the funniest in people.
meanings.sent2: The funniest in the class always had a joke ready.
meanings.sent3: The funniest of all the stories made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: His talent for making people laugh earned him the title of the funniest.
meanings.sent5: The funniest at the party had everyone in stitches with their humor.

meanings.sent1: Laughter is the funniest medicine for a bad day.
meanings.sent2: The funniest of all the activities was the comedy show.
meanings.sent3: The funniest moment of the play had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: His sense of humor made him the funniest person to be around.
meanings.sent5: The funniest part of the book was the unexpected plot twist.
